description: Modules deferred for future implementation. These represent future capabilities that are not yet prioritized.

modules.description: UI showing the same loop at different zoom levels (module/system/org). Music-gear-like looping interfaces for piloting, co-piloting, or playing co-op PvE with the orchestrator.
modules.notes: Requires dashboard foundation to be solid first

modules.description: Macroscopic technology progressions that cultures/orgs pursue. Predictive capabilities (potentially RL-based like AlphaGo with Markov decision trees) that inspire MECE opportunity mapping at system and module levels.
modules.notes: May be superseded by skill-trees for most use cases

modules.description: System for enforcing/guaranteeing LLM behavior. Explicit rules enforcement patterns for ensuring consistent agent behavior.
modules.notes: Partially implemented in GuaranteeService for skill guarantees

modules.description: Multi-engineer loop coordination. Transform the single-player loops experience into multiplayer: command parsing across engineers, thread management per engineer, merge/rebase workflows, engineer status tracking, and cross-worktree coordination.
modules.notes: Foundation exists in slack-integration, needs consolidation

modules.description: Voice input and output for piloting the orchestrator. Naturalistic speech for contexts where you can't hold long documents in your head (driving, jogging). Dictate requirements, hear status.
modules.notes: Voice output service exists, needs voice input

modules.description: Special patterns and loops for brownfield contexts. Making orchestrator as good at brownfield as it is at greenfield.
modules.notes: Essential for getting systems to completion for launch or checkpoint

modules.description: Full loop for creating business model artifacts. Structured exploration of value proposition, revenue streams, cost structure, channels.
Full loop for GTM strategy artifacts. Market analysis, positioning, launch planning, channel strategy.
Domain loop for marketing workflows. Content creation, campaign management, audience development, analytics.
Constructed environments providing domain ontology (vocabulary, entities, operations, workflows, shared concepts). KnoPilot is reference implementation.
modules.notes: KnoPilot service is the first runtime context

modules.description: Collaborative ontology building across multiple users, multiple AI agents, and user+AI combinations. Creating multiple ontologies with different participant combinations.
Collecting and organizing tools, patterns, frameworks, skills, and loops across the ecosystem. Ensuring nothing useful is orphaned.
Architecture ensuring orchestrator works without internet. Encryption, sync protocols, and security for the journey from local to public apps. The foundation for true ownership.
Sleep/background processing mode for proposing new modules and improvements. The system dreams up new work while idle, ready for review when you return.
Framing the dream state ladder as finite games with clear win conditions. Understanding the infinite game the org plays.
Wake up to decks ready for review: knowledge decks for spaced repetition, project proposal decks for autonomous execution.
SRS for skill mastery and knowledge retention with SM-2 algorithm.
